instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00239 - No image internal display, works and external showing up.
threads.message: Where to start, tryed to change driver but nothing

threads.title: 820-00239 - No image internal display, works and external showing up.
threads.message:
Any fault history available?
Did you try known good LCD display assembly?

threads.title: 820-00239 - No image internal display, works and external showing up.
threads.message: tryed working display, no image. but external working

threads.title: 820-00239 - No image internal display, works and external showing up.
threads.message:
Give us some voltage and signals checked on LCD connector.

There should be some fault history...

threads.title: 820-00239 - No image internal display, works and external showing up.
820-00239 - No image internal display, works and external showing up.
threads.message:
Very likely CPU's eDP output has been damaged.
There is no series capacitors placed between LCD connector and CPU, on data lines.

threads.title: 820-00239 - No image internal display, works and external showing up.
